name: 尼古拉·特斯拉
bio_short: 塞尔维亚裔美国发明家、电气工程师和物理学家。他最著名的成就是设计了现代交流电 (AC) 供电系统，发明了感应电动机（`tesla_ac_motor_1887`）和特斯拉线圈，被誉为“创造20世纪的人”。
bio_short_en: A Serbian-American inventor, electrical engineer, and physicist. He is best known for his contributions to the design of the modern alternating current (AC) electricity supply system, the induction motor (`tesla_ac_motor_1887`), and the Tesla coil. He is often called 'the man who invented the 20th century'.
